game.name: Free New York Taxi Driver 3D Sim
game.description:
Who would not like to drive a car on the beautiful city of New York? And fun would be double if you get a chance to control a taxi car in a city that is full of crowd! Yes, today we have brought to you a brand new racing game where you are playing the role of a taxi driver. Join Free New York Taxi Driver 3D Sim and be prepared to polish your taxi driving skills to the optimum level possible!

Begin with the career mode and complete all levels to become a professional taxi driver in this HTML5 car game! Select a cab you want to drive and get ready to find your passengers and drop them to their destinations! It is up to you whether you want to practice your driving skills on London cab or Yellow cab. There are multiple tasks to complete before allowing you to earn the taxi license. Race and drive your chosen cab through the multiple streets of New York City in this one of the best taxi games for boys!

Pick up and drop pedestrians to their desired locations with the help of maps! Do not forget to avoid making any traffic violations when you are on your way towards your destinations. Hurry up boys! You have to complete missions before the time runs out to earn cash. Upgrade your vehicles using that cash! Good luck to be the best taxi driver in town and have a blast online without download!
